Bullets.SubTitle: Achievements/Tasks
paragraphs: Currently create value with Tecnotree Nigeria via provisioning and maintenance of various backend and customer-facing services for MTN Nigeria including CRM, CLM and whole sale billing services.
Collaborated with teammates to design a future proof and scalable solution that provides and automatic and seamless payment option for MTN postpaid customers.
Facilitated the launch of a new blended learning solution actively participating in diagnosis and debugging while conducting UAT tests, resulting in a well rounded solution which we named MOMENTS.
Productively Contributed to various updates, clarification and stakeholders meetings, generally resulting in better stakeholder management and client relations.

Bullets.SubTitle: Achievements/Tasks
paragraphs: Worked on various research reports, presentations, process documentation; greatly improving workflow standardization.

Planned, designed and installed automation equipment to create unforgettable experiences for clients using cutting edge smart home technology including intelligent lighting, Distributed audio and video, advanced security, and remote access.

Bullets.SubTitle: Achievements/Tasks
paragraphs: Collaborated with school management and students to enact new policies and strengthen old ones. This improved the overall student experience and qualit of life withing the campus
Planned, facilitated and coordinated various extracurricular programs grared towards students' academic and lifestyle improvement
